title: No icon for mystery gift DRAAAAVEN DAY event
body: According to the {{champion:119}} day celebration, we were supposed to receive an icon for sending a mystery gift to a friend.  I sent a mystery gift to my friend he opened the gift and I received a notification.  However, I did not receive any icons for the mystery gift.  Any info on the matter would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Icons are distributed after the event. :)
Thank you for the feedback.  Really appreciate it! :D

Next time read the whole article.
You will receive it after the draven celebration is over.
